title: Interpretation of dreams of someone giving me a child for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone giving me a baby girl in a dream about a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone is giving her a baby girl. It is a sign that she will soon marry a man she loves. Seeing someone giving me a baby girl in a dream indicates the money she will get. This vision is also considered a worthy vision. With praise, it symbolizes the goodness that permeates her life. Seeing someone giving an unmarried woman is a small sign, perhaps it is a sign of the benefits that come from him because of his desire to communicate with the girl, and God knows best. Also, this dream is about a college student who sees a stranger giving her a baby girl. It indicates that she gets high and distinguished grades and has a bright and happy future in her professional life. Giving a baby girl to a girl from a stranger is good news for her in her next job. A beautiful child in one’s dream is considered good luck. A beautiful child that an unmarried woman sees smiling at her in her dream It is a sign of her marriage to a person who has good qualities, God willing. Seeing a beautiful child indicates the sustenance that comes to this girl, and she will also obtain good things, God willing. When you see that the girl is not beautiful and dirty, this dream is not good. It shows that something is not good. It will happen to her in her life. He must adhere greatly to prayer. And God knows best. If the girl laughs, this is a sign of upcoming events that will make the girl happy, God willing. And the laughter of a young girl in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news that the worries she suffers from due to problems will disappear. Perhaps the appearance of a girl in dirty clothes and the girl was dirty in a single woman’s dream. A sign. Breaking off the engagement, perhaps God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me a baby girl. Interpretation of seeing someone giving me a baby girl in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that someone gave her a baby girl. This dream indicates the marital stability and security that she feels. If a woman gives her a baby girl in... In the dream, she is someone you know. State that the pregnancy has occurred if she is delaying childbearing.. and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Also, seeing someone giving her a child in her dream. It is only a sign of the money that she will get next time, God willing. As for the breastfeeding girl of a woman Married in her dream, it is good news that she will feel satisfied with her life. An infant in a dream is a good sign for her husband, because he will receive abundant sustenance, God willing. A young child chasing a married woman indicates that there are disagreements with the family and she is the one looking for a solution, God willing. He knows best. When she sees Married woman that the child utters the shahada, tell her that he will get what he wants and desires. A laughing child in his dream may be a sign of good things to come. When he sees a bald child with no hair, it is a good sign of impenetrable life. Interpretation of seeing someone giving me a baby girl In a dream about a man and its meaning, when a man sees the presence of a small child in his sleep and laughs with him, this is good news for him that goes beyond the truth. Likewise, the child’s smile is good news in the end and will overcome difficult situations for him, God willing. When a man dreams of a small child chasing him, perhaps it is a sign that he has problems in His life

title: The woman in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you the interpretation of a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin about an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. The interpretation of this vision differs according to the condition of the woman who dreamed of it. The interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream differs from the interpretation of seeing an old woman, as it differs according to the shape of the woman and the condition of her body. If she is fat or thin, and in the following paragraphs through the encyclopedia, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream according to what the great interpreter Ibn Sirin explained in his book. A woman in Ibn Sirin’s dream The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a woman in a dream is a commendable dream, indicating the coming of goodness, happiness and great livelihood in the dreamer’s life. But seeing a thin woman in a dream indicates poverty, financial crises, problems and concerns in the dreamer’s life. If the sleeper sees fat women in his dream, this is a sign of great wealth, and that he will get a lot of money in his life. If the dreamer dreams of beautiful women, this is a sign of salvation from the problems and worries he suffers from in his life. If the sleeper sees in a dream that a woman is smiling at him, this is a sign of great wealth, wealth and wealth. Seeing a very beautiful blonde woman in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into discord. Seeing a group of women in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees a woman in her dream, this is a sign that she will succeed in her life, or that she will get a high position in society or that she will be promoted in her job. If a girl sees An unmarried woman dancing in her dream, this is a sign of sad news reaching her. Seeing a gynecologist in an unmarried woman's dream indicates that she is going through a difficult time and that she is suffering from psychological problems that bother her, but God Almighty will help her change her life for the better. Seeing a woman wearing white clothes in a single woman's dream indicates that her engagement date is approaching. Seeing a group of women in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a fat woman in her dream, this is a sign of the great and great wealth that she will acquire in her life. What is the dream of a thin married woman? This indicates poverty, worries and problems. If an unmarried woman sees an unmarried woman in her dream, this indicates that there is an unmarried girl in her life who is trying to harm and hurt her. Seeing a woman praying in a married woman's dream indicates stability in her married life. A gynecologist in a married woman's dream indicates that she is an intelligent woman who gets along well with people and enjoys an excellent position in her home. A woman in a dream about a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream with women means that she will give birth to a girl who will be happy with her. A gynecologist in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that God will facilitate her birth and that she And her fetus is in good health. Seeing an unknown woman in a dream for a man If an old man sees in a dream, this is a sign that God will grant him wealth and riches after poverty, and this vision may indicate the collapse of problems and worries. If a man dreams that a woman is looking at him, this is a sign of his illness

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing dirt in a dream, seeing red dirt in a dream, seeing white dirt in a dream, and interpretation of seeing black dirt in a dream.

preview.html: Seeing dirt in a dream: Dirt is one of the elements created by God Almighty, including man, according to His saying: “And We created man from a stem of clay, then We made him a seed in a safe place.” Seeing dirt in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing dirt in a dream The interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream indicates that The person will acquire a lot of wealth after a long period of fatigue and hard work. If the dreamer gets dust in his hands, this is an indication that he will obtain food and goodness according to the amount he obtained. Whoever sees that he is hitting his hand on the ground, this is an indication that the person will enter into many Of projects and achieves a large profit, and if he puts it on his head, this means that he will suffer many worries and misfortunes, and if he sees the sky raining dirt on him, this indicates justice and a change in his affairs for the better. Yellow dirt in a dream indicates that the person will obtain a lot of money, huge wealth, and dirt. Soft indicates an increase in profit and livelihood and the ability to achieve the dreams and desires he seeks without facing difficulties. Seeing dirt in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing dust in a dream means that the rich will increase his wealth and the poor will find work through which he can obtain his daily food and sustenance, and it symbolizes a prisoner at work. Hard work. Seeing dirt in a dream means that the dreamer will carry his children and grandchildren. Carrying dust from one place to another indicates that he will move to another house or travel, and removing dust from a grave indicates that he will be blessed with a child. Whoever sees in a dream that he is cleaning his house from dirt and is suffering. Of the debts that have accumulated on him in reality, this is a sign that he will pay all the debts and remove his worries as quickly as possible, and if he has any relatives. Or friends who are traveling, this is evidence that they will soon return from exile. If a prisoner sees that he is cleaning his house from the dirt in it, the vision indicates his freedom. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Seeing dirt in a single woman’s dream indicates the girl who sees Dirt in a dream indicates that she will hear good news soon. The interpretation of a dream of an unmarried woman cleaning her home furniture from dirt indicates that she will be exposed to many problems and severe pressures. If she sees light dust, this indicates that she is concerned with something and wants to know the truth about something mysterious about her, If it is strong and powerful, this indicates that it will fall into many crises. Seeing some people throwing dirt on it in a dream means that it is surrounded by many enemies who are trying in different ways to harm it. If you see clouds of dust in the air, this is evidence of the presence of some problems and difficulties that have led to To transform a person’s life from comfort to distress and sadness. Seeing dirt in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing dirt in a married woman’s dream indicates that her husband will receive food and goodness without suffering or fatigue. Seeing in her dream that she is sweeping and collecting dirt means that she is gathering her children around her to A table to eat and divide them among themselves. If she sees

title: Interpretation of a dream that I was kicked out of my husband’s family home in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I was expelled from my husband’s family’s home in a dream We may look for an interpretation of a dream that I was expelled from my husband’s family’s home in a dream. Therefore, you need to be careful and not completely believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream that I was expelled from my husband’s family home in a dream If a woman dreams of being expelled from her husband’s family home, this may indicate severing family ties, and God knows best. A woman’s dream of being expelled from her husband’s family home may indicate In the dream, it indicates her excessive distance from her relatives at that time. And God knows best. Anyone who sees in her dream that she was expelled from her husband’s family home in the dream may indicate that she will be exposed to a very annoying problem during this time. A woman’s dream of being expelled from her husband’s family home in a dream may indicate some disturbances that happened to her with her husband’s family in Those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about selling my husband’s family’s house in a dream: If you see your husband’s family selling their house in a dream, this may indicate the many disputes that exist between them. Selling the husband’s family’s house in a dream may indicate a major deterioration in the relations between them during this period. If a woman sees her husband’s family selling their house, this may indicate financial crises that they may face in those days, and God knows best. If she sees her husband’s family selling the house in a dream, this may indicate many obstacles and health crises that they suffer from, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a woman sleeping in my bed with my husband in a dream: Seeing a woman sleeping in her bed in a dream may indicate some serious differences that existed between them during this time. In the event that you see a woman sleeping in bed with her husband, this may indicate that the woman feels extremely jealous of Her husband during those days. Seeing a woman sleeping on a bed in a dream could indicate some important changes occurring in her life during these days. It is possible that a woman seeing her husband sleeping with another woman in bed may indicate some disputes and problems that exist between them during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about kissing my ex-husband in a dream Kissing my ex-husband in a dream can indicate important changes that occur between them during this time. Seeing a woman kissing her ex-husband in a dream may mean that she will return to him again, and God knows best. In the case of a dream about kissing A divorced man, this may indicate the end of worries and sorrows from the dreamer’s life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he is kissing his mother-in-law in a dream may indicate changes in the events that may happen to him in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the head of my husband’s mother In a dream: Whoever dreams of kissing the head of her mother-in-law in a dream may indicate safety and health between them. A dream of kissing the head of a woman’s mother-in-law in a dream may indicate her desire to have children in those days, and God knows best. This dream may indicate that something good is about to happen. title: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing ants in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream a large number of ants entering her house, this means that she will earn a lot of money. This vision also symbolizes the happy life that this woman lives, and the peace of mind and stability in which she lives. As for what we will see, they are black ants. A good sign for her is that God will bless her with pregnancy soon. Likewise, if the woman is pregnant, this is a sign that she will give birth to a male by God Almighty’s command. But if she sees ants coming out of her house, this foretells that she will suffer many losses. We will see termites in the case of one, two, or three ants. This explains the number of females that the woman will give birth to. This dream is considered a sign that the woman is exposed to many problems, and that she faces many pressures and difficulties in her field of work. Seeing dead ants is interpreted as a sign of goodness, a lot of food and a lot of money that comes into it. Interpretation Seeing small black ants in a dream indicates family visits and gatherings. Seeing small black ants indicates a large number of children and an increase in offspring. Also, this dream explains the death of a person in the event of his illness. Many interpreters say that seeing black ants portends problems, difficulties, and pain that will happen to him. The dreamer also indicates the distress of the situation and the sadness that the dreamer is experiencing. It indicates the accumulation of debts on the viewer and the financial loss that he will suffer in his life. Such a vision is a clear sign that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies and that the people who are conspiring for him want to harm him. It also indicates that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies. It is seen in a married woman’s dream as an indication of disagreements and problems between her and her husband. Seeing black ants in general foretells the opinion that there are people near him who have envy and hatred in their hearts for him and who wish that goodness and blessings would be removed from his hand. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream in Bedside commentators unanimously agreed that ants on the bed symbolize bringing a lot of goodness, increasing children and money. This person will die just like seeing ants flying out of bed and a sick person in bed. Seeing ants in the bed of an unmarried girl is interpreted as the imminent date of her official engagement. As It is an indication of the presence of many loyal friends in her life, who give her all feelings of love and loyalty. This vision symbolizes the positive opportunities that will be available to the woman in her life and is evidence of the good luck that she will enjoy in all aspects of her life. Seeing ants in a dream for a single woman. This vision is an indication This girl's constant and continuous thinking about her future. It also symbolizes her marriage and that God will bless her with children. This also symbolizes a lot of ants in a dream about an unmarried woman. This indicates many sins and sins committed by this girl. It also leads to the presence of many bad friends in her life. It also indicates a lot of kindness, abundance of food, and an approach of joy and pleasure in her life. If ants bite this girl,

title: Interpretation of a dream about an ophthalmologist for a married woman

preview.html: The interpretation of the vision depends on our site for an interpreter to determine the details of the vision and the marital status of the visionary or the seer. Interpretation of visiting an ophthalmologist in a dream for one girlWhen an unmarried girl dreams of seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream, this indicates balance and correct thinking for the girl. As for the girl who sees herself talking to an ophthalmologist In a dream. This means that she is thinking about doing something, but this is not true, so she must reconsider herself. Either she sees herself arguing with an ophthalmologist in the dream. It symbolizes her inappropriate behavior and is characterized by excessive nervousness. Seeing an ophthalmologist in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the amazing success she has achieved in her work. It also symbolizes the dreamer’s great confidence in herself and her ability to overcome the trials and tribulations she faces in her life. A married woman sees an ophthalmologist in her sleep. It shows that she is characterized by good and positive qualities such as ambition and spontaneity. The vision also indicates that the owner of the vision supports everyone and loves the best. others and to share their sadness and joy with those around her. When a married woman complains of an illness and dreams of an ophthalmologist in a dream. It is a good sign for her to find the appropriate treatment for her condition, and to approach recovery and get rid of pain. Likewise, is a married woman watching an ophthalmologist perform a surgery on her? It is an indication of the purity of her heart, and the gift of faith and good morals. title: Interpretation of the dream of dyeing hair for single and pregnant women in detail

preview.html: The dream of dyeing hair has many interpretations, connotations and symbols that vary between good and evil, as many women resort to dyeing their hair in different colors, and in this article we will provide you with an interpretation of the dream of dyeing hair for singles. Pregnant women in detail. A detailed interpretation of a dream about hair dye for women and pregnant women. A detailed interpretation of a dream about hair dye for women and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing hair dye in a dream. This vision is considered an auspicious vision that indicates positive changes that occur in the dreamer's life. Seeing someone dyeing his hair brown in a dream means excellence and success. However, if the dreamer is a man and sees in a dream that he is dying with yellow hair, this vision is not good and is a sign of committing sins and disobedience. The death of white hair in a dream indicates closeness to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair by Al-Nabulsi. A dream about dyeing hair yellow or red is an indication of the problems that the dreamer faces. Dyeing your hair brown in a dream means happiness and wealth. A dream about dyeing your hair brown also indicates fertility. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair red. Dreaming that you dye your hair red means a close relationship. Dyeing hair dark red indicates the problems that the student falls into. A detailed interpretation of a dream about hair dye for women and pregnant women. Interpretation of hair dye for blind women. Seeing an ordinary girl dyeing her hair in a dream means positive changes that occur in her life. Dyeing hair in general in a girl's dream is evidence of abundance And longevity. A girl's dream that she dyed her hair red indicates her great love for a person she will soon be engaged to. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a married woman If you dream of a married woman dying her hair brown, this means happiness and stability in life. A dream about dyeing hair black in a dream indicates that she loves her husband very much. A married woman who dyes her hair blonde is evidence of the illness she is exposed to. Interpretation of dyeing hair during pregnancy Seeing a pregnant woman dyeing her hair blonde in a dream means that you will hear happy news. If she sees another woman dyeing her hair yellow, this indicates her envy. Dyeing hair black indicates a difficult birth. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a man A man dreams of dyeing the hair of a deceased person, this indicates unpleasant events, especially if he dyed the hair of the deceased's mother blonde. This indicates his need to pray for some of his good deeds. Dyeing hair black is evidence of the presence of certain opponents in the dreamer's life. If a person sees in a dream that he dyed his hair black and was happy with it, this indicates success and excellence in work.

title: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a single woman through this article. God Almighty said: (They said: Disobedient dreams.) And we do not interpret dreams with two worlds (44). The aforementioned interpretations are unavoidable, but they are from the imams’ jurisprudence in interpreting dreams, and then we present in the encyclopedia some interpretations of seeing a snake for a single woman. A snake in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a single woman. If a girl sees a black snake in a dream. This vision shows that there are many obstacles that disturb her in her life and spoil her relationship with others. Among the interpretations related to seeing a black snake in an unmarried girl’s dream is that the appearance of the black snake symbolizes the psychological disorders that this girl suffers from during this period. Seeing a black snake in a woman’s dream Unmarried One of the visions that warns the girl having the vision that there is a malicious person in her life among the people close to her and that this person is deceiving her and that she is emotionally attached to him. Him.If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is killing a black snake, then this vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that portends the wise girl’s salvation from all enemies and hypocrites in her life.But if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a black snake is biting her twice in a row. This vision symbolizes that she will be able to defeat her enemies. Seeing a black snake also symbolizes the evil woman present in this girl’s life who always reminds her of gossip and bad words. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake for a single woman. Among the common interpretations about the appearance of the green snake in an unmarried girl’s dream is that it It indicates the future husband of this girl. If an unmarried girl sees the green snake in her dream. This vision expresses that this girl will marry a pious and righteous man in the future and that this person has a lot of love for her. But if she sees in a dream that she has been bitten by a green snake. This vision expresses the imminent marriage of this girl. An unmarried girl who sees a green snake in a dream indicates that her reconciliation in an important matter is approaching, whether it is in study, work, or marriage, and that this husband will be distinguished by good morals and religion. Interpretation of a dream about a white snake for a single woman from the interpretations It is known that seeing a white snake for one girl shows the honesty, purity, and righteousness of that girl. As for seeing a white snake moving in a dream. This dream expresses that she is characterized by her naivety and excessive kindness with which she treats all people. Among the interpretations related to seeing a white snake in an unmarried girl’s dream is that it symbolizes that girl’s expense, waste, and extravagance. Seeing a white snake in a dream means that this girl will marry a good man. Interpretation of a dream Yellow snake for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees a yellow snake in her dream. This vision is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate that many difficulties, problems and problems are approaching this girl’s life, and these difficulties may come from enemies or diseases. Among the interpretations of the appearance of the yellow snake in an unmarried woman’s dream is that it symbolizes

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hospital in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hospital in a dream: When someone sees a hospital in his dream, he worries about the interpretation of this dream and what it expresses, so seeing a hospital in a dream is actually a source of concern or not? This is what we will learn in this article. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hospital in a dream: Seeing a hospital in a dream is a positive thing that requires optimism and that good things will happen in the work of the person who has the vision, and if this person is looking for a job, then seeing a hospital in a dream expresses that he will. Getting the job he wants. If the dreamer is married and has problems with his wife, then seeing the hospital in a dream represents the end of these problems and the improvement of their situation, but if the dreamer is in debt, then seeing the hospital represents the repayment of these debts and his financial stability. When someone sees in a dream that He entered and left the hospital, this expresses that there are changes in his life that make it better and get rid of everything that bothers him. However, if the dreamer is in a bad psychological state, seeing the hospital in a dream expresses his freedom from anxiety and sadness, the improvement of his psychological state, and the stability of his life. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the hospital In a dream, Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a hospital in a dream expresses the dreamer’s need for more love, care, and attention from those around him, but in the event that the dreamer was suffering from certain diseases, seeing the hospital in a dream expresses the extent of his illness. Anxiety and his thinking about these diseases and his suffering from them. On the other hand, Ibn Sirin said that when an unmarried person dreams of being admitted to the hospital, this means that he will enter into several failed relationships that will lead to many problems. Moreover, if one sees in his dream that he is entering and leaving From the hospital, this means that this person will enjoy good health and live a long life, God willing, and God knows best. Sometimes seeing a hospital in a dream expresses a person getting rid of negative thoughts and achieving the achievements and goals that he desires, and the only person who sees in his dream that he is entering a clean hospital, and this It requires optimism because it expresses it. His success and the fulfillment of his dreams and aspirations. Interpretation of seeing a single woman visiting a sick person in the hospital in a dream. Scientists have interpreted that when an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is visiting a sick young child, this indicates that she is suffering from sadness and anxiety, and that she is exposed to some family problems, while in the case of the girl An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is visiting an old man in the hospital, and this requires optimism because it means that her life will change for the better and she will be happy in her life. But if the girl sees in her dream that she is visiting someone in the hospital that she does not know, then this expresses her love for goodness and that she is a good girl. Her behavior is good and she is popular among people. But if she sees that her father is sick in the hospital and is visiting him, this is a negative thing that expresses her exposure to financial loss, her hardship, and her poor livelihood. Interpretation of seeing a married woman in the hospital in a dream When a married woman sees in her dream that she is visiting her sick relative in the hospital, this

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on the edge of a high place in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking on the edge of a high place in a dream: We may find the interpretation of a dream about walking on the edge of a high place in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know its interpretation. On the site, they do not make interpretations, but they are from the heart. Interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream of walking on the edge of a high place in a dream. In the case of my personal view that he was walking on the edge of a mountain, this may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer faced in those days. In the event that A person sees that he is walking on the edge of a high place, this may indicate the sadness that the dreamer is facing at that time. Seeing yourself walking on the edge of a high place in a dream may indicate the high status that the dreamer may obtain during this time. In the event that one sees that he He was on the verge of a high position, so this may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on wet ground in a dream: Anyone who dreams of walking on wet ground can indicate positive changes that occurred in his life at that time. A person’s dream that he was walking on wet ground could be a sign that dreams and aspirations will come true with God’s grace. Whoever dreams that he is walking on ground filled with water, this may indicate longevity and enjoyment of good health. In the event that a person sees that he is walking on ground Wet, this may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about walking on desert sand in a dream: We find that walking on desert sand in a dream may indicate that the visionary will be exposed to some major turmoil in his life. Seeing him walking on sand in the desert may indicate... The isolation that the dreamer enters at this time, and God knows best. If a person sees himself walking on the desert sand, this may indicate his need to work with others during this time. In the case of my personal opinion, that he was walking on the desert sand, this may indicate an abundance of money. Which the dreamer gets at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of walking on sea rocks in a dream If someone saw that he was walking on sea rocks, this may indicate that he spent a lot of money during that period. A dream of walking on sea rocks in a dream may indicate To some big changes that occur in the life of that period. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on the rocks of the sea, it may be a sign that the dreamer is interested in some positive things in her life during those days. Interpretation of a dream about walking with blood in a dream: Anyone who dreams of walking on blood can It is a sign of the dreamer’s bad deeds and he must repent to God Almighty. Dreaming of walking on blood in a dream may indicate some obstacles and problems present in one’s life during this period. If one sees that he is walking on blood, this may be a sign of some illicit money that The dreamer was getting it at that time, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is walking on blood, it may be a sign of sins and disobedience committed by the dreamer in those days, and God knows best.
